msIdentifier.repository: Washington State Archives, Eastern Regional Branch
msIdentifier.collection: Walla Walla County Government; Clerk, Territorial Court Civil/Criminal Case Files, 1860-1892

div1.p: Territory of Washington County of Walla } SS In District Court before Hon E P Oliphant Judge
JM Burks & Wm Moore vs W Tompkins

J M Burks and Wm Moore complain of W Tompkins and alledge that they are restrained illegally of their liberty by the said Tompkins That the pretense under which the said Tompkins held these Plaintiffs is that they have been guilty of a violation of of the laws of Montana Territory Plaintiff say that they are not guilty og said charge and that no complaint has been filed against them by any person authorized to file complaints and they are not held under any legal means and that their imprisonment in the city jail of Wallaualla city is unjust and illegal They therefore pray that a writ of Habeas Corpus may issue and the Cause of their commitment and imprisonment unto by me count and is in bound by
